oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WNOX news report -- Art Linkletter's House Party (opening)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WNOX news broadcast with commercials. End of disc contains the beginning of Art Linkletter's House Party, with guest Pierre J. Huss (chief of the Hearst Headline Service Bureau at the United Nations). Circa March 1962.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Mentholatum commercial -- International news report -- Ex-Lax commercial -- International and Washington news report -- Ammens Medicated Powder commercial -- Good Housekeeping Magazine commercial -- Local news report -- Weather report -- WNOX Station ID -- Opening statement (Art Linkletter) -- Mum Deodorant commercial -- Art Linkletter interviews Pierre J. Huss (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WNOX (Radio station : Knoxville, Tenn.); CBS Inc.; House party (Radio program); Linkletter, Art, 1912-2010; Huss, Pierre J. (Pierre John), 1903-
